name: Chibs Lives
description:
Submission for Robot Party Jam 2022

Play as Charlene Chibs, a resurrected scientist who was once killed by her idol, Gigantimus after the massive robot sat on her. It's been ten years since her death and she is chasing down the man that resurrected her: a mysterious figure known only as WARLOCK. Her chase leads her into the husk of her once idol, Gigantimus.

---Controls---

wasd to move

space to jump

left mouse to shoot

right mouse to interact

esc or backspace to pause.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project was a ton of firsts for me! First time doing pixel art, making a 3d game and finishing a game jam. It was a lot of fun, took way more of my life than I expected,  and I learned a lot about Unreal Engine blueprints. I'm leaving on a vacation and won't be able to do anymore work on it before the end of the jam but I did my best to deliver a final product despite cutting my scope way back. Let me know what you think!

Thanks!

Charlie aka rubbery_shrubbery
